ch0084_09_kenkyuin/2701_0701_01_10:
I’m thinking about renovating the lighting here to
be more in line with Team Break’s aesthetic.
ch0084_09_kenkyuin/2701_0701_02_10:
We could make it all a bit darker and add some
red lights to really let you know we’re bad guys!
ch0084_09_kenkyuin/2701_0701_03_10:
That was the plan, anyway...but the lady working
in the café was against the idea. She said, “No
way! That’s not cute at all!”
ch0084_09_kenkyuin/2701_0701_04_10: I guess I’ll have to give up on this plan, huh?
